answers.answer: Good question, I wanna know too. Bump!

Ok so my friend had hers done this is what she said, the doctor takes his fingers and separates the membrane sack from your vaginal wall. She said she would not sugar coat it, out was very painful. But if it works it should work within 24 hours.
You have to be dilated to get your.  Membranes stripped

I'm due the same day but he said if she doesn't come within two weeks ill still be having her in two weeks due to excessive swelling. So I'm going to try that cumin tea tomorrow to see if it will help induce
I'm due the same day and had an appt today, they never check anything when I go. Pisses me off
I had my membranes stripped with my last baby. It did nothing for me. They reach up there and do a sweeping motion and that's it.
I had my membrane stripped today and I didnt feel anything but a little pressure. It didnt hurt at all! You have to be relaxed when your doctor checks you...so try to relax :)

Okay so mixed stories of pain from stripping lol.. I just hope it works!! Im tired of tge migraines and dizzy spells and he said having the baby is pretty much the only cure for preeclampsia!! Not to exciting.. I guess it just developes theres really no official reason as to why some woman develope it and others don't.. Maybe i should try some tea.. Because sex and walking hasnt progressed me any :-( although after he checked me ive been having alot of pretty intense menstrual like cramping.

question: Im 36 weeks 5days at my ob appt today my doc went over my 24hr protein urination test and im border line for having preeclampsia so he checked my cervix im still closed but he wants to strip my membranes on Tuesday and hopes i will progress on my own if not ill be getting induced the first week of NOV my official due date was NOV 15 so i guess im pretty excited but kinda scared as to what expect i never had any of this done with my daughter 5years ago!! Whats it like getting your membranes stripped??
title: Stripping membranes!!
